content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Furnace for Iron Plate Smelting at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of: Furnace  
Use-case: Smelts iron ore and coal into iron plates to bolster resource availability for subsequent Lab crafting attempts.

### Copper Furnace for Copper Plate Production at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of: Copper Furnace  
Use-case: Converts copper ore and coal into copper plates to help resolve the resource shortage affecting Lab production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
- Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval  
  • When calling get_entities, ensure that parameters match the supported signature (avoid unsupported keywords like “radius” and verify the number of positional arguments).

- Lab placement and iteration errors  
  • Verify that the Lab item is available in inventory before attempting placement.  
  • Check for None values before iterating over collections of Lab entities to avoid runtime errors.

- Crafting failures due to missing sub-ingredients  
  • Confirm that all intermediary components (such as iron‑gear‑wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available or producible before initiating Lab crafting.  
  • Validate that the entire production chain (including necessary smelting and sub-crafting steps) is operational to prevent repeated crafting errors.
